name: ORDER_RX_RPT_HX
description: This table is used to extract history of report information for each order. From the table, you could find out when the label is printed.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication order (prescription) record. NOTE: This is an internal unique identifier for ORD master file records in this table and cannot be used to link to CLARITY_MEDICATION.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for each report printed for the order.

columns.name: REPORT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the unique action user.

columns.name: REPORT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
